column5: It,s always been our families tradition as far back as I can remember, to break the wish bone the day after the feast . Weather it be christmas or thanks giving. Our boys did it all the time growing up. Today it was just her and I.  We can,t share the wishes we made,but here,s to wishing,and hope most come true. I had a long list.
yeah we did the same , had to fight for the wishbone growing up
Always a tradition in my family. Depending on where it broke determined who's wish came true.
Yup same here... My and my sis would battle back and forth as to whose wish came true....Stupid birds.
We were only allowed one wish, not a whole list.
We were only allowed one wish, not a whole list.   I was playing the odds . LOL
